meta.content: Martinsville Community Unit SD C-3 is located in Martinsville, IL.

img.h1: Martinsville Community Unit School District #C-3 Home

div.div: To dedicate our efforts to meet the educational needs of all learners in a positive and progressive manner, to maximize individual self worth, and to foster the development of responsible and productive adults.
Today Governor Pritzker announced that schools will not resume in-person instruction this school year.
Next meal and packet distribution April 14th.

span.span: Of High School Students in clubs

span.a: 255 West Cumberland Street, P.O. Box K, Martinsville, IL 62442
